items.title: U.S. kills six in latest strike on alleged drug boat, Hegseth says
items.description: The operation marked the 10th known attack on suspected smugglers from Latin America, pushing the reported death toll to at least 43.

items.title: Social Security cost-of-living rise in line with inflation but trails key expenses
items.description: The annual cost-of-living adjustment is in line with overall inflation, but it trails categories such as energy and health care.

items.title: Republicans who once opposed Trump’s military impulses now lower their guard
items.description: The president’s talk of further escalating his campaign in Latin America poses uncomfortable questions for some in Congress.
